content.detailedDescription: Was in my car see sphere that is illuminated the fluctuated the object was stationary then it goes in little circles the light twinkles.  it seems to stay in one place moving slightly.  i have seen it multiple times it's very bright but not a star it's an object that appears to be hovering over field in front of some houses. once i saw it in the back by a building on my property.  my husband has seen it also.
content.summary: Observe it hoovering above power lines and field.  it seems to do little circles hoovering over field in front of houses.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a teenager, my parents and i were heading to the symphony when we saw an extremely large black rectangle or triangle ufo outside our house.   

the symphony started at 8pm. my dad never wanted to be late so we left a little after 7pm to make sure we made it there in plenty of time.  our house is on a small hill near the end of our block. it was twilight to dark. as we left the house and started walking down the front steps down to our car ��� we saw this black object floating just barely above the tree tops.

it was enormous and hardly moving.  it spanned from one end of our block to the other end. i don���t know how long our block is but the object was more than the length of our block and there are 6 three story colonial houses between our house and the end of the block and the object was long enough to cover them all.  it was wide also covering houses on both sides of the street. the object was also thick (maybe one story or more thick) and not aerodynamic at all. there is no way that should be flying. it was so large that we could never see the far side of it. we really only could see 2 sides of it so it could be a rectangle or a triangle.   
we walked down the steps and into the middle of our street and stood directly underneath it.  it was very close nearly touching the tree tops (large oak trees in our neighborhood).  it was a matte black and blocked out the sky from our view because it was so massive.  it had lights on the underside -some large, some small, but the lights were dull and not bright. i can���t remember where the lights were but know some were different colors. the side of the object had a window like opening which had dim lights. 

with an object flying so close, it should have been loud but this object didn���t make a sound but you could sort of feel it in your chest.  even blimps make sounds but this object just didn���t make a sound.
we stood directly underneath it for several minutes looking up and then it slowly drifted up the side street next to our house. it went from moving straight ahead to moving at a 90 degree angle without turning. we kept walking with it up the side street while it was directly overhead. it was gliding so slowly that it was easy to keep walking with it.  
we could have kept walking with it but my dad said that he didn���t want to be late for the concert and we had to go. in the end, we watched the object for about 15 minutes.  i didn���t want to go but we did. when we got into the car, i asked my dad what it was and he said that he didn���t know and didn���t want us to talk about it ever again.  i tried to bring it up several times and he made it clear that we were to never discuss it. years went by without talking about it��� when my dad was dying i asked him about it and he couldn���t remember it happened.   i thought maybe it was all in my mind so a few years after my dad died i asked my mom if she remembered and she did.  this made me both relieved and frightened.  we���ve talked about it several times since then. 

while i wasn���t afraid while we were watching the object, those moments since seeing it have haunted me almost every day since.  i���ve been uneasy sleeping at my house since that night and have had to sleep with a light on only when i���m there. every time i felt the slightest low hum, i rushed to my bedroom window to see if it is there. i���ve since moved away but my mom still lives there. i moved to a very large city and oddly i sleep better in this large city than at my childhood home.  

we had no idea what the object was when we first saw because it was and remains like nothing we've ever seen before. we noticed it because it took up the entire sky above our street and was very very close to us. we could not miss it unless we were blind. it was one of the most pivotal moments in my life. an investigator may contact me if needed.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An extremely large black rectangle or triangle ufo outside our house.

content.detailedDescription: My wife was on the deck at the rear of our home it was about 8:05 to 8:10 pm and the sky was cloudy. i stepped out the door and she said look up to the north, northwest and i saw an object that had red, green and white lights. at first glance i thought it was an airplane but as we watched, the lights did not strobe and there was no sound. all of a sudden this thing accelerated at incredible speeds (such as we have never seen before) and would stop in the sky again. then it made right angle turns, ascended and descended at those same incredible speeds. it would descend downward behind the roof tops where we would lose site of it and then a couple of minutes later it would shoot back in the sky at the incredible speed like being launched. it would stop in the sky and change directions at any and all directions at this incredible speed. this happened at least three times in about a 15 minute time span each time going further to the northwest and disappearing from site. we have seen strange objects in the sky before but nothing as shocking and amazing as this. my wife got a couple of pictures but it was as it was getting further away and are not very clear but in one you can see it as it accelerated.
content.summary: Object with red, green & white lights moving at incredibale speed and quick directioal changes

content.detailedDescription: Observed it from the gallery of my house. tried to record it first over my mobile and later on my handycam (yes i had this much time while the lights lasted). i first thought this was the beam of a searchlight but later noticed that it was made up of 6 to 10 smaller "<<" shaped lights moving one behind the other in a circular pattern and moving towards ne from e. some of these "<<" lights jumped up from this trajectory and after rising a distance, dropped down again and realigned with the other lights. this was a bit unusual, so i started recording after observing this. i have two videos but both the videos failed to capture these lights convincingly. you will have to use your peripheral vision to observe these and this might take a number of attempts. i am hoping that you will have the technology to maybe put some filters on these videos to see these lights. i observed them for about 15 mins after which these lights disappeared. these lights were observed by me and my wife. they were not reported by anyone later. i came to know about your site through a youtube video and so decided to share it with you.
content.summary: A group of 6 to 10 "<<" shaped lights hovering in a circle, some jumping pattern

content.detailedDescription: Back in 2000 -2001 i was employed at the police department as the patrol night shift sergeant with the police department,my shift was from 7pm - 7am. on this particular night,i had been at the police department for a short break.I walked out to my patrol car and left heading east. i drove one block over and noticed something on top of the post office that caught my attention.I stopped my patrol vehicle in the street between two vacant parking lots.  the post office was located one block to my north of my position. this was a cloudless night and very clear. my driver side window was down and was in direct line and view of what i was observing.I first saw something light green getting larger as it was heading across the roof of the post office toward my direction. as i watched it, i began to realize it appeared to exactly resemble a person walking.  it stopped at the edge of the flat roof of the post office on the side facing me and stopped. the best description i can give of the thing i saw is the following:  it appeared to be about 8 foot tall. i base this by the height of the post office wall in porportion to the things  height. the body of the thing had a regular build to its height,meaning what a person who have who was in good shape. not fat or skinny. the most extrodinary item was the thing was transparent. the lines of the thing were flourecent green with gave it somewhat of a mass but was still transparent.The thing had great 3d detail. every feature except for the height appreared to be human. the clothing appeared to be what i would describe as a jumpsuit. but again, it was all one color and made up by its green outlines.The thing appreared bald to the best of what i remember. the thing stood at the edge and put its hands on its hips and turned its upper body a began looking back off to the west as if it was observing something. it then turned and began looking off to the east for a few seconds. all i could think was that i cant believe what im seeing and i hope it didnt see me.  a few seconds later it looked down directly at me. i didnt feel fear. i dont know if i could actually see a smile or just had that feeling like it was smiling and saying, "well you saw me." i never felt threatened. the thing turned and began walking back the way it came. i remember saying to myself, like hell your getting away. i drove to the back side of the post office (north side). the walls to the post office are about 25 foot tall on all sides. i knew it couldnt jump down.  i called the fire departemnt which is located next to the police station and told them to bring a ladder truck over to the post office because i believed someone was on the roof.  another police unit left the police department and set up watching the opposite sides of the building.About 5 minutes later the fire department arrived. i told the others to stay down and i would check the roof. i climbed up on the roof and there was nothing. i searched the spot on the roof where it was standing and the path it walked and found nothing. i believ the roof was graveled but cant remember for sure. the officer and fire department personell im sure thought i was nuts thinking someone was up there. i dared not tell them what i saw. so i sat on this for years and only told a few close friends about the experience. since the internet has come out i have tried to research any other sightings such as this but have found nothing.I can say this with the utmost confidence. i know what i saw.  there was too much detail in the thing. this was a very clear night. the thing had the dark sky behind it so it was easy to see, not to mention its size. i have been retired from the pd for 4 years now. i run my own business and do private investigations and security contracts. if you have had any other reports like this i would greatly appreciate a response. this has bothered me for years and i just would like to know what yall think i saw or what it could have been. thanks in advance! if you need an exact time and date the police department should have made a call report on the incident.The month and day above are just a guess. i cant remember. but the year should be close.
content.summary: 8 foot tall bright green outlined being that was transparent.

content.detailedDescription: This event occurred in puerto rico specifically in the island of vieques during a us army reserve annual training. at the time i  was a pfc e-3 to a headquarters company during the training everything looks normal the exercise was as plan and after completion 4 or 5 members of my platoon we decide to sit down and talk for a while, the night sky was really clear beautiful, and suddenly a sphere was ascending from the ground red orange color we stopped taking and observed what was happening, we thought was a kind of illumination flare normal for this kind of exercise but suddenly the object when gained altitude and stop, the object expanded in size and turned red in color and on a blink of an eye this object travelled north with incredible speed and dissapeared. we were quiet, speechless for about 10 seconds and i asked my fellow soldiers if we were in the same page on this on what we saw was really something out of the ordinary and everybody agreed. this definitely was an ufo not matter what, i decided to tell my story because it is time to let people know about the real existence of extraterrestrial and also that we are not the only ones in the vast universe.
content.summary: Military exercise observed

content.detailedDescription: This was taken by a trail camera in new mexico in the mountains. notice movement of deer on the left side of picture. there is a time stamp at the bottom of both pictures. the year reads 2012 but it was not set properly. it's 2014. the camera is set to take pictures 3 seconds apart.
content.summary: Picture taken by trail camera. notice deer on left

content.detailedDescription:
Here is the link to the raw footage containing (what my wife and i strongly believe) was the ufo sighting in northern ky, right above south fort thomas. 

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

time of the recording was at exactly 10:05 pm. the formation was flying from se towards sw. about twelve of them, bright round orange globes, perfectly silent, no blinking lights, nothing looking like airplanes what so ever. direction and path was linear. location was on south 27/alexandria pike, off 471 going uphill towards woodfill elementary school in fort thomas, ky. 

about myself - i am a professor at college of business, university of cincinnati (my work email address is in the second field.) i would be happy to provide further details.
content.summary: Flight formation about a dozen objects, perfect silent, bright orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my house about to be on my way to get bread from the local store, when i looked up and see odd looking contrails in the southern sky from either a large plane or missile i thought, there was two main ones that formed an x kinda almost cross like. i thought it could even be chemtrails so i decided to grab my phone and take a picture of all the trails, been researching independently for many years now on many conspiracys and projects the government is try to keep secret along with other esoteric topics plus trying to find out about our ancient history and were we really came from, so im always looking up. after taking the picture i got in the car and went to the store and got the bread then came home, i didn't examin the picture on my phone till around 6pm later that day to find inthe one picture i took 3 unidentified craft, one disc shaped craft on the middle left with very a very reflective exterior silver in color about 150-200ft away. on the lower right corner over some power lines was the second craft with round exterior with appendages hanging from the bottom, looks as if there is an aura or an electromagnetic field disturbance around the craft, the exterior is a black in color it was about 150-200ft away if not closer. the last craft is higher in the sky 300-400ft at least,black in color also and unknown shape looks as though it was was descending. the picture needs to be zoomed in to see greater detail of the objects. the silver disc looks like an alien craft along with the craft on bottom right not sure about the other ufo.
content.summary: I look up to see strange contrails when i was about leave to the store so i took a picture thinking it might be chemtrails come to find on a later inspection 3 ufos i could not previously see with the naked eye

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside along with another employee and the security guard waiting for the other employee to get picked up. i was just looking up at the stars and i noticed a really bright star. it then started to fade away. i watched it fade for a bit and then i asked generically "are you seeing this". the other employee didn't look up but the security guard said yes. i hadn't even said specifically what i was asking about. i then asked asked him what he saw and he said he saw a bright star go away. i was pumped. i thought i witnessed the last breath of a supernova. i've been checking the web for any news on supernovas for tonight but nothing has been mentioned so i expanded the search to "bright light fading march 15" and other variations but still no results. i'm now posting my experience with mufon because i once noticed an object streak across the entire sky and they quickly called me and informed me that it was most likely a satellite. i'm hoping they will call again with an explanation for this sighting.
content.summary: It looked like a really bright star that faded away.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard when out of curiosity of what really goes on late night in the sky i witnessed an orb hovering above the march air force base. there were two other star like objects which i had seen in the sky that would move a distance way to fast for it to be a star. many other days when i would come out side stars would be in their original place but the ones that i had mentioned were no longer there the next day and today. the moving star-like objects happened the same night the orb was above the military base. i went in the back yard this night and had seen "stars" which are not supposed to be their, sometimes seeing a red orb at times. i have confronted the base in the past about their shady activities along with drone operations over residential areas which they deny along with recorded phone calls by the faa office in riverside which tried to tell me the faa does not regulate the military even though their site says otherwise including personal emails from the armys media relations saying that the faa does in fact regulate the base. i have emails from california representative mark takano speaking of the commander acknowledging drone usage over moreno valley, so who's not to say the base is doing causing these orbs for fishy purposes to be used in the future for whatever these things are capable of........That's my exact reaction after seeing the orb along with other things..
content.summary: Suspicious , very suspicious

content.detailedDescription: There were about a dozen of us around the fire tonight when mid sentence the host stopped and asked "whats that", we all looked to see a bright orange light above which was a perfect circle which seemed to glow red from the inside, it moved over our heads stopping twice, i found it beautiful and then seemingly upon the approach of the helicopter it vanished.   my eyes were drawn away for a moment by the bright search beam and green navigation lights of the helicopter. when i looked back in the direction i had last seen the red orb it was gone. the stark contrast between the beautiful silent movements of the orb and the screaming  loud helicopter left me in awe.  ive grown up here, i see a helicopter in flight weekly,  and i see the charleston air force base planes hourly.  nothing i have seen prior even remotely resembled what i witnessed this night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It appeared as a perfect spherical orb with a red glow and a glowing orange light underneath,  it was silent.

content.detailedDescription: It started from my backyard by seeing an orb/plasma exactly above march air force base (which i have video but not yet to release). i then saw what looked like a star close by the base begin to move atleast 1 mile west from it's original point within 30 minutes. there was a moment when this star was not visible as it shifted so fast behind the tree and came out the other side, it would continuously move down from the moreno valley area towards riverside. this star would sit for a roughly 2-3 minutes with a beam of light flashing downwards at times and then would move just a little bit repeating itself.. as i moved around to keep my eye on it i then saw what appeared to be a disc shape with red lights blinking around it with no pattern and was stationairy. today i witnessed the same thing but this time another ufo having red lights flickering out of order flying over the first disc shaped ufo i just mentioned. i then went the next day to where i had thought it was located but found nothing whatsoever. the photo appears to show it on a mountain but the same day i searched for remains i recognized that not a single tower was located on any hil or mountain which has the characteristics of what i saw. i did not lose sight but rather went to bed after it already being close to 12 am. my belief is that the object is military involved. a lot of strange behavior has been taking place this past week and a half. jet formations, cargo planes flying in circles, marine gun ships and an awac radar jamming airplane. i've questioned the military on past issues like drones being flow over moreno valley residential areas and received contradictory statements but from my discoveries of ufo snapshots in palm springs , military aircraft to orbs over the base have me thinking the military is prepping for something either related to the ukraine crisis or of something else. i will admit all fault for pinning this on the military if it truly is not.
content.summary: Something new and suspect the military involved.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down my street at about 8:30 pm. i looked up in the sky, out the driver's side window and saw three large orbs hovering in the sky. i got to the end of my street and did not have a good view, so i made a left, and then a right hand turn then pulled over. i rolled down my window and watched them. i thought maybe there was fog and that the fog was discoloring  airplane lights. but there was no fog, and they were not moving.  some people came out of their house so i decided to move down the road a bit further. i made a left on the next street,and immediately pulled over. the orbs were sw in the sky. as i was watching, two of the orbs faded out. cars were having to go around me, so i pulled up the road further. i looked up, and the last orb was still there. i took a right on a side road, parked and got out of my car. the orb was amazing. i knew, without a doubt, that this was not normal. it was large, so blatantly obvious, just hovering. i got better look at it and it was orange, pulsating and kind of spinning. i could see that the interior was brighter than the exterior of the object. there was some kind of movement, but it was hovering while moving. after watching it for a minute, a small aircraft was flying at about the same elevation, fairly close by. the plane was traveling ne. from my perception, the orb seemed bigger. after a few minutes, maybe a minute after the plane flew by, the orb started to head south. as it was leaving, the same orange color was visible. the orb flew at a pretty high rate of speed, it's size decreased dramatically as it got further away. then it was just gone. 

throughout the sighting, i didn't want to waste time taking pictures. i didn't want to miss anything. i had my phone and had to force myself to stop looking and try and take a photo. i thought i snapped a photo then tried to take video. i have a very short video only.  my adrenaline was pumping, but i was calm, yet excited. if it was right in front of me, maybe i would have felt fear.
content.summary: 3 orange glowing orbs hovering in sky. 2 disappeared, 1 stayed for a few minutes then flew off.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my residence in rancho santa margarita, ca around 7:45 pm to pick up my daughter when i looked se and saw six amber/glowing orbs. i quickly grabbed my camera and started recording. two of the orbs faded and four remained for quite some time. my fiance witnessed the event as well. when the orbs blinked out, i waited for them to return. after five minutes, four of the orbs reappeared and slowly moved left. i shot some video, but since it was on my cell phone it was not too clear. i have witnessed many sightings since the 80's, from florida to california. some in the day as floating metal discs, which shot away after a few minutes and an amazing flyover of a silent amber orb, which silently flew over the 5 freeway on el toro road. it stopped over rockfield street for about two minutes and then changed trajectory to south and then stopped and then dropped out what looked like sparks from below. that was in 2001. what i witnessed tonight could have been flares from a military jet or an actual craft of unknown origin. anyone else see this? sorry for the blurry footage. cell phone video could not focus properly.
content.summary: Observed up 6 glowing amber orbs.

content.detailedDescription: They have show me how to build a gravity drive motor they put it in my head years ago and sad when the time is right you know how to build it and now i have not the means of the money to build it but it is very simple the way works it's so simple they don't want everybody to know iti i would like to talk to someone the don't think that i'm crazy are nuts.
content.summary: It was a wedge shaped but short stubby wings homeade

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving in to work the morning of the 12th of march 2014 at around 6am, i noticed three very bright round white lights grouped closely together moving very slowly across the sky from west to east.  the light in the middle was a little higher that the other two lights.  the sky was too dark to see the object itself.  i noticed the object as if something called me to look in the direction of where it was.  i lost sight of the object as i passed it at the same moment i drove under it.
content.summary: Three round bright white lights grouped together moving slowly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving in to work the morning of the 12th of march 2014 at around 6am, i noticed three very bright round white lights grouped closely together moving very slowly across the sky from west to east.  the light in the middle was a little higher that the other two lights.  the sky was too dark to see the object itself.  i noticed the object as if something called me to look in the direction of where it was.  i lost sight of the object as i passed it at the same moment i drove under it.
content.summary: Three round bright white lights grouped together moving slowly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: The next day and for several weeks and a month or two black choppers with no markings kept coming by and then periodically show up mostly at night. and started up again but would realy like to you about the new things ,     date 2014.03/12. sort of scarry!
content.summary: I felt something that i ha to go to and see,strange sinsation! i went and saw.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 2009 (may-july), my boyfriend and i woke up early one morning, around 6am i think, and went outside onto the porch of our trailer, to smoke a cigarette.  the porch had a metal overhang that covered the entire porch, except the steps. we were sharing a cigarette, standing on the porch under the overhang, facing the steps (south). i walked down one or two steps and looked up at the sky.

i remember it was a nice, warm, clear morning. it was mainly a clear blue sky, and when i looked up i saw something flying, which was odd because it seemed like it just appeared, i didn't notice anything in the distance before that. i was facing south, and at first i thought it was a plane because it looked pretty big to me. but then i realized it wasn't a plane.

i heard no noise from it. i thought i could see a rounded, long beak/nose and a giant body. i would maybe compare it to a bat or a pterodactyl, i didn't see any feathers. it was hard to tell because it was kind of shadowy, i guess, is what i would describe it as. or blurry, like it was blending in with the sky or surroundings. but it wasn't invisible, it was just hard to see details. it's coloring was grayish brown, dark, maybe even black, which i think helped the shadowy, blurry camouflage thing it did. it's wings looked like a bats wings and it was pretty big, not as big as a plane like i first thought. maybe the size of a small plane, like one that sprays pesticide on crops, or a little smaller.

i was facing south, standing on the bottom steps of my porch, and it was flying over my neighborhood, above the treetops, heading north. i ran out, about 2-4 ft. away from the porch, so i could see over the overhang and trailer, and had a more clear view of the sky, facing north. the strangest thing about it was how it flew. it looked like it was swimming through the sky, kind of gliding. it undulated through the sky, and i think it was going pretty fast, although the way it seemed to just swim through the sky made it look like it was going slow, leisurely. 

my boyfriend saw it about the same time i did, i can't remember who actually saw it first, but we both ran out, away from the porch steps, to get a better view of the sky. another strange thing happened once we were no longer on the porch, under the overhang. as soon as we got out in the open and were watching this thing swim through the air, we both got this feeling of fear. i don't know if it was just because i saw this strange, unknown object/creature flying above my house, but as soon as i moved away from the porch i got extremely scared, like i knew it could see me now, and could feel it watching me. the feeling intensified, getting much worse, until i looked at my boyfriend for a second, and we both freaked out, ran up onto the porch, and inside the door. 

the second we got inside, the feeling of fear lessened, and my boyfriend immediately ran back outside, and i followed him. he went off the porch so he could see over the trailer and i hid behind him, but we did not see it. afterwards, he said he got the same feeling of fear, like it was watching us, and intensified until it made him run for cover, too. it had to of been moving pretty fast, because we should have been able to see it flying for awhile, the skies were clear and it was easily visible over the treetops, with a large area of sky visible in the direction it was going.  

the last i saw of it, i was a few feet out from my porch steps facing north, looking up at the sky. it was already pretty far out past my porch and trailer, probably 5-6 trailers away, steadily swim/flying north, and it seemed to be staying at the same altitude, above the trees. it took about 5-10 seconds to run inside, then back out to where we last saw it, probably less time for my boyfriend because i was being cautious, staying back behind him, and he just ran back out to where we last saw it. the entire incident took maybe a minute. i saw it for maybe a total of 30 seconds, and it travelled from right past the porch overhang, above the steps, to nearly the other side of the neighborhood. 

the entire time it still had that weird blurry, shadowy, blending thing going on, which could have had something to do with the way it flew. the way it moved, it did not look like anything flying, whether bird or plane, it looked like it was swimming through the air, like a snake or jellyfish would swim through water. i could almost put it off as a plane or bird that i had the wrong perspective of, or the sun shining made it look different, except for the way it flew. i've never seen anything seem to appear and literally swim through the sky like it's water, cause intense fright, then disappear. it may have flown off in a different direction or landed somewhere instead of disappearing, and the fear may have been natural. but i don't know what i actually saw, if it was some type of creature or aircraft? i think some creature, but what was the blending thing it did? i just don't know.
content.summary: One morning during summer of '09 my bf and i saw a giant shadowy/misty bird type creature/object

content.detailedDescription: An object that appears to be made of metal, yet it is not detected as metal under a traditional metal detector! something that could be thousands of years old from another world? it looks a bit like an ancient version of iron mans core reactor! i found the object in pieces not complete, i have since glued the pieces back together and retuned the piece itself with cleaning products. this is my version of the petradox, something that could be extraterrestrial origin from the zeta reticuli star system.
content.summary: Ufo debris found & discovered!

content.detailedDescription: I noticed 2 objects with white color rounded shapes, kind if identical with the same size next to each other with some distances from each other located well above the altitude of couple airliner flying over that area i saw them from the same spots slowly changing locations toward the west, and suddenly disappeared after being more than 20 minutes in my eye site.
content.summary: I noticed 2 objects with white color rounded shapes the same size next to each other with some distances from each other above the altitude of couple airliner flying over that area i saw them from same spots slowly going to the west and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was not there, but my good friend took a photo and described it to me. he was the only one who saw it, and he has no reason to lie to many of his good good friends.

event occurred in boone, north carolina on stadium drive.

on the night of october 13, 2013 at 20:16, my friend noticed a diamond pattern of lights in the sky in the north west direction. the lights are perfectly geometrical, and were completely still. they did not move at all for about 15 minutes until they dimmed and disappeared. my friend took a photo before it disappeared and noticed in the photo that there were three rather than just one. he checked to make sure that it wasn't just a glare in the photo that was causing the shapes to appear, but once again, the lights were perfectly geometric. in the photo, and according to him, there was no surface - the objects were transparent. maybe it was because of the clouds, but in the photo you can see that there is no color/texture/pattern revealing a surface. there is only empty space surrounded by geometrically sound lights/orbs. 

the photo was taken on an iphone 4, so the quality isn't so great. you can see the ufos hovering above the tree line. you have to zoom in to really see them, but trust me, they are there. 

i hope this helps, and i hope that someday the world will accept the fact that we are not alone.
content.summary: Three diamond like shapes floating in sky. only lights visible, no actual surface visible. transparent?

content.detailedDescription: Was in bed sleeping at night in the summer. my first notice was off my family behind a log in a small woods.Did not really notice the craft. it was on the ground and i was scared. my dad was along side of me and told me to run, i wanted to stay with family but i remember running towards the house. i remember getting half way home when they caught me. i then remember being inside laying down and not being able to move. i turned my head to the side and saw my parents sitting along a white wall and not moving. i looked up and saw some type of needle and it was going to stick me in the belly button. i cried to my dad to help me and he started to get up but was stopped some way and was told that he loved me but couldn't help me. i remember having nose bleeds that summer and something like a small piece of tooth pick came out of my belly button and i had a burning feeling in my belly button.There is more to the story if you are interested in hearing it but it happened so long ago i don't think you would be interested. i don't even know why i am telling you now.
content.summary: My whole family was taken into the ship. i can only remember small flashes of my experence.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking from the parking lot to my home, which is on the delaware river.  i was looking up, watching some sea gulls flying over head, when i noticed an object which looked like a star, it was right over head, moving e-ne (approx 030 compass heading). it covered, maybe a 20 degree arc in 5 seconds and appeared to be in the high flight levels 30-40 thousand feet, or more. i am not certain if it "disappeared" or went behind a cloud when i momentarily looked away.  i would say it looked like a satellite, except i've only seen satellites at night out in the country - i doubt they are visible in daylight. 

the weather was sunny with a few scattered cumulus clouds at maybe several thousand feet. 

i know this is a boring observation, but the fact that it covered such an apparent amount of distance in such a short time, and that it was moving in a perfectly straight line, prompted me to file this report.
content.summary: Looked like a star moving very fast in a straight line, heading aprox. 030 degrees.

content.detailedDescription: Walking to trail head in estes  park  object  came out of cloud,then  backed  up and  the n  ,forward . i shot photo . my sister asked  if i got the photo and then said that i just got  ufo .
content.summary: Object out of cloud , then in then out then in

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were on our way to a friends cupcake event, we were driving north on i45 between wilmer tx and dallas tx before the i30 exit. i looked out my window i was on the passengers side because i saw lights out of the corner of my eye. i saw what i first thought was a plane except it would of been too low and it was just hovering there. i asked my sister what the hell is that she said oh it's a plane. i asked her well aren't planes supposed to move. there were 6 round bright white lights at first they were not flashing, then they started flashing i was trying to open my camera to get a video and it just vanished. we looked all over for it but we couldn't locate it again. we don't know what we saw but we can't be the only ones that saw it.
content.summary: Driving into dallas from palmer saw something we thought was a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: ! see short description
content.summary: Witnessed 3 ufo's circling over head, our convoy of 5 destroyers in inverted v formation for 3/4 hour clearly illuminated by the sunshine starting about 7 pm,  then i had to stand watch. 300 + sailors potentially saw the ufo's.

content.detailedDescription: Anaheim, ca- wed evening march 12, 2014 approx 7:30 pm while sitting in the backyard looking south toward katella ave, i saw a bright-white star-like orb being followed or chased by a helicopter. the brightness of the orb initially caught my eye, then i noticed how fast the copter was following. usually copters do not fly that fast. they both were travelling from west to east about 80 mph fast, straight and horizontal about 300 feet up. they were travelling parallel to katella ave from about beach blvd vicinity when i first noticed. i ran and got my binoculars and watched as they passed in front of me. the copter was close to it, maybe 50 feet behind and slightly above it about 30 degrees. i could see the copter. i could see the orb light, there was not a craft attached to it, just a bright sphere of light. the orb appeared to be no larger than the cockpit of the copter. as they continued on fast, straight and horizontal, the orb faded out around harbor blvd vicinity. the copter kept going until it was out of sight. 5 minutes later 2 loud military type helicopters flew by along the same path. there were many helicopters heard that night but i did not see any more strange flying lights. this orb was self illuminated and looked like a flying ball of light, not like an aircraft with a fuselage of any sort. too bad i didn't get a video or anyone else at home to see it, it happened so fast!
content.summary: Helicopter chasing white ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the front yard walking my dog. around 9:55pm. i noticed it because it looked like a rocket ship with a big flame going straight up. it looked like it was miles away.  it seemed like it was ascending faster then our rockets but i didn't think anything more until the big fire ball went out. it stopped ascending about a mile or two up. then it started flying north twards me very fast. in seconds it covered hundreds of miles flying over my house. when it was above me out was a round object glowing a dark orange color. i was waiting for the sound to catch up to it and was expecting a loud boom but it never made a sound. i was confused and tried to make sense of it, but i've never seen anything or heard of anything move that fast. i'm still scratching my head in amazement.
content.summary: Charlotte county fl,  rocket like object then jetted off north.
